subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Despite a roster overhaul, new arena, new address and recent change in coach, the Nets closed 2012 much as they began it: looking hapless and lost, this time in a blowout to the Spurs.
snippet: Despite a roster overhaul, new arena, new address and recent change in coach, the Nets closed 2012 much as they began it: looking hapless and lost, this time in a blowout to the Spurs.
